title: Quarto & Github Actions
text:
A 2×2 covariance matrix Σ can be plotted as an ellipse, which is a contour line of a Gaussian density function with variance Σ. See Figure 1 for an example.

JuliaPython




Code
using StatsPlots

covellipse([0,2], [2 1; 1 4], n_std=2, 
           aspect_ratio=1, label="cov1")
covellipse!([1,0], [1 -0.5; -0.5 3], 
            showaxes=true, label="cov2")





Figure 1: Covariance ellipses






1+1

title: 2  quarto-actions
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.
